FuncDef: The reset dustproof run-time command remonitors whether the runtime of the air filter reaches the cleaning cycle.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of the chassis.
The value ranges from clc1 to clc49.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The system generates an alarm about cleaning the air filter. After ensuring that the air filter is cleaned or does not need to be cleaned, you can use the reset dustproof run-time command to clear the alarm and remonitor the cleaning cycle of the air filter.
Configuration Impact
The cleaning cycle of the air filter is monitored only when the value of the cycle is not set to zero.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
The cleaning cycle of the air filter is monitored only when the value of the cycle is not set to zero.
